message: Let's start fair!  50/50 split seems like a good way to begin.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is still a good deal for you!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 55/45 split is more fair.  Let's work together to find a solution we both agree on.
I see you're willing to compromise, I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours, 58/42 is a fair deal considering the inflation!
